about_the_game:
Discover Floating Worlds

Explore a vast array of randomly generated floating islands with unique biomes and resources. The environment constantly changes, offering new opportunities to gather materials and adapt to the unknown.

Gather and Prosper

Harvest essential resources like wood, stone, and rare ores to fuel your survival. From basic tools to powerful upgrades, every resource plays a role in your journey. The right materials could mean the difference between thriving or struggling to survive.

Build Your Fortress

Transform your main island into a thriving base! Construct buildings, upgrade your equipment, and establish a stronghold to protect yourself. Your base grows with you, becoming your greatest asset against the nightly threats.

Survive the Onslaught

As night falls, waves of enemies swarm your island, threatening everything you've built. Arm yourself with powerful weapons and work together to repel the relentless attacks. Victory demands preparation and a sharp mind for survival.

Enhance Your Power

Collect over 40 enhancement items that boost your stats and grant unique abilities. From faster movement to increased damage or health regeneration, these items stack to make you stronger as you progress. Each enhancement pushes you closer to conquering the Void.

Choose Your Champion of the Void

Choose from a variety of champions, each with unique abilities, strengths, and weaknesses. Whether you excel in magical attacks, ranged precision, or melee power, there's a character to match your survival style.

Solo or Squad Survival

Survive alone for the ultimate challenge, or team up with up to 4 other players. Share resources, cover each other's weaknesses, and face the dangers of the Void together. In this hostile world, teamwork is the key to survival.

name: Void Frontiers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I7-7700HQ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I7-10700K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Void Frontiers is a survival roguelike set on randomly generated floating islands. Gather resources, craft tools, build your base, and defend against nightly enemy waves. Play solo or team up with up to 4 other players, customizing your playstyle with over 40 unique enhancements.
